title: Betting and Gaming Levy (Amendment) Bill
decision_details:
- The Cabinet at its meeting held on 2022‑07‑04 has granted approval to amend the
	Betting and Gaming Levy Act No. 40 of 1988. The clearance of the Attorney 	General has been received to the Bill prepared accordingly by the Legal 	Draftsman. As such, 	the proposal made by the Hon. President in his capacity as 	the Minister of Finance, Economic Stabilization and National Policies to 	publish the said Bill in the Government Gazette and submit the same 	thereafter, 	to Parliament for approval, was approved by the Cabinet.
